name: Falling Tower
description:
You are a treasure thief, after successfully stealing the golden crown of an ancient monster, you hastily leave the tower, but the last explosion of the monster destroyed the base of the tower and now the walls begin to crumble floor by floor and you need to destroy the monsters and urgently look for a way down.

Falling Tower - a top-down game where you need to get out of each floor of the tower in time, destroying the monsters and dodging the falling stones of the wall.

Control:
WASD - Movement
Arrows - Direction of impact

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Level Generation
- Difficulty
